pages.text: Provides +2 as well as +10% to the amplification of spell effects, as well as 25% increased duration of effects. This modifierr is unique to the $(l:amethyst_imbuement:trinkets/witches_orb)Witches Orb$(), to obtain it you must craft your orb using the appropriate aspect gem.

pages.mod_text: The orb reflects the blazing fire of the gem within and empowers magical effects, both good and bad. Appears on a Witches Orb if crafted with the proper gem.
